textLong:
• AVG … Average of the average of <measurement> per image.
  • MEDIAN … Average median of <measurement> per image.
  • MIN … Average min value of <measurement> per image.
  • MAX … Average max value of <measurement> per image.
  • STDDEV … Average standard deviation of <measurement> per image.
  • SUM … Average sum of <measurment> per image.
  • CNT … Average number of values per image used to calculate the selected <measurement>.

In all statistical calculations, only valid objects are utilised, with the exception of the "Valid" and "Invalid" measurements, which are observed in their entirety.

Examples: 

  • The utilisation of CNT in the context of measurement, whether valid or invalid, yields a consistent outcome, namely the total count of objects.
  • The application of the SUM function to the measurement of valid objects within an image allows the calculation of the average number of valid objects per image.
